reviews.review_msg: Makes online assignments purposely harder. Hard to reach when you need help (email). Sometimes wont be able to answer a question directly, so hell repeat what the textbook says without clarifying. Hell give handouts but often forgets to collect them. If you havent taken other classes with him he wont remember you throughout the course.

If youre not big on participating (in class) expect a B or C for participation. Online participation isnt taken entirely into consideration. If you read the textbook well, youre good for tests. Make sure you write over the word limit on tests bc if you meet expectations youll receive a lower mark. So, go over the word count.

Lectures are not clear. Does not know how to articulate her knowledge. Poor lectures. Powerpoints are unclear and boring. Not much homework though. Easy grader. Doesn't challenge you at all. If you just want a course to pass and don't care about learning take her class. Did not like her at all! Shuts down discussions, short temper. Judgemental. F
one of the best and nicest professor ever. I'd suggest to take a class with her.
Never take Phil 101, logic and reasoning. Waste of you life
